I assume you are a business owner and want to manage your data on your phone as well. I would suggest you to wait for Samsing Galaxy Note 20… or 11… or whatever they will name it this year. I have used a lot of phones… and I mean a LOT o phones. The one phone I would use to manage my student/business data is Samsung’s Note lineup. They really are best for managing business data. If you cannot wait for this year’s Note, then go with Note 10 or if you also want a headphone jack, then go with a Note 9. Don’t go below that. Of course, this is my opinion. I categorize every phone I use so that picking a phone for myself to use daily or to manage my business data or for non-tech savvy or for tech savvy etc becomes easy. And Note series has been on top of my management list for a while now. Other alternative (of course in my opinion) would be OnePlus 7 Pro. Don’t spend more on 7T or 7T pro or 8 or 8 Pro. 7 pro is on par with them and costs a lot less. Good luck.
